title: Soloerotica
overview: The erotic pleasure of women alone. Twenty scenes of solitary ecstasy. For the true fan of XXX, nothing much compares to watching female masturbation. Perhaps it's because this simple act remains one with which most of us can closely identify. We've all been in personal situations where we've been fortunate enough to watch a woman pleasure herself. We can relate; we can get our personal memories involved, and that makes the act a stirring event.  Now enter Michael Ninn and the Ninn Worx style and you've got a wonderful visual event as well. Ninn Worx gives us 20 beautiful starlets in each of the Soloerotica releases ... Twenty individual women in twenty awe-inspiring locations ... twenty women shown as only Michael Ninn can show them.
